title: I have $200 for the best offered Card!
author: MLB535

posts.post_title: I have $200 for the best offered Card!
posts.post_content:
I have $200.00 left to spend for the next little while. So I figured that I would give this a shot...

I will leave this posting up for the next few days and trade my $200.00 to the seller with the best graded card being offered.

Post pics .. or pm me ... whatever you think will seal the deal!

Would love a graded 1 2 or Authentic : Ruth, Dimaggio, Gehrig, Walter Johnson, Christie Mathewson, Cy young, Ty Cobb .. Realize its a long shot... but there may be someone motivated to help a new vintage collector out.


Cheers!

Ps. I live in Toronto Canada. Shouldn't be an issue, but to be fair I wanted to make it well known that I live outside of the USA. I have over 1000 purchases with 100% feedback combined between here / ebay / blowoutcards.ca
Anything good today? Had a few solid offers! but still nothing that has knocked my sox off!
Know this might be a long shot, but any graded 1 2 or authentic ruth, cobb, young, mathewson, johnson available?
I have an end panel of Walter Johnson from a T202.
noticed your end panel... i would have been all over it if it was a complete panel! Thanks for the offer.... SILL LOOKING

[quote name="mlbtraderumorsn" post=1238618]Know this might be a long shot, but any graded 1 2 or authentic ruth, cobb, young, mathewson, johnson available?[/QUOTE]

I know there is a board member who had a ruth churchman a few weeks back think it was graded bvg 5 or so. If your intetested let me know i have his user id in my pm files
@evilking00 thanks. i picked one of these up as a trade show a few months back. psalm 3 for 35$ :-)
